pages.title: Moss Elephant
pages.text: Living moss that has taken the form of an Elephant. It typically stands lonely on the beaches or swamps. Actually it's a representative of the Svyatostroone, one of the Elephant Gods. It's afraid of no one but the Beaver Zombies. Drops Sweet Bread in a moment of fear and runs away. But the elephant can award you, check the next page.

pages.title: Blessing
pages.text: Moss elephant can slap a sprinkle of its mighty power onto your stuff! Check JEI of the item above for more information.
